sentence.Network_en: Spirits cabined and confined by winter expanded like matted cotton wadding fluffed out again.

sentence.Network_en: He bought a new quilt with very soft wadding for himself.

entry.def: Wadding is soft material which is put around things to protect them, for example in packing.

means.word_mean: 1. any material used especially to protect something
